sentences.sContent: New technology is going to revolutionize everything we do.
sentences.sCn: 新科技将彻底改变我们做的每一件事。

sentences.sContent: His work revolutionized the treatment of this disease.
sentences.sCn: 他的研究成果给这种疾病的治疗带来了革命。

words.tran: 革命的；旋转的；大变革的
彻底改变（等于revolutionize）；使革命化

trans.tranOther: to completely change the way people do something or think about something
